text: The 2017 Swiss Open Grand Prix Gold was the fifth Grand Prix's badminton tournament of the 2017 BWF Grand Prix Gold and Grand Prix. The tournament was held at the St. Jakobshalle in Basel, Switzerland on 14–19 March 2017 and had a total purse of $120,000. ==Men's singles== ===Seeds=== # Lin Dan (Champion) # Shi Yuqi (Final) # Ajay Jayaram (Withdrew) # Jonatan Christie (Withdrew) # H. S.
